dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3170565O] Duplicate Content.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2007 8:46 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3170565O] Duplicate Content. ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Duplicate Content. Added by system at Wednesday, Feb 21 2007 11:36 am X-MailFrom: gnabeel@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Feb 21 11:36:14 2007 Received: (qmail 15972 invoked by alias); 21 Feb 2007 17:36:14 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 15969 invoked from network); 21 Feb 2007 17:36:14 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 21 Feb 2007 17:36:14 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 21 Feb 2007 11:36:13 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 21 Feb 2007 11:36:14 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from gnabeel@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HJvO1-0004tR-RZ for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 11:36:13 -0600 Received: from wr-out-0506.google.com ([64.233.184.230]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from gnabeel@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HJvNm-0000vf-FB for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 11:35:58 -0600 Received: by wr-out-0506.google.com with SMTP id i11so2507486wra for ; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 09:35:57 -0800 (PST) DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:in-reply-to:mime-version:cont ent-type:references; b=EQ2TXS0uqooDfHkRrPHHIbhOzM0mE+apQ1ICkvt8tK2o1grFjh6/mUHdEL8pS9ojgrkdWu 1KPfAvwP7SKKh/yO3FD4rSWoanlWeNyVUROkIDif1aLNM1Fu/yTIgc5UmMRRr1zVLyvjDjHB EcozZPZE/J2qFBz0xhmxynxg7FVek= Received: by 10.114.111.1 with SMTP id j1mr3889696wac.1172079355443; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 09:35:55 -0800 (PST) Received: by 10.114.107.11 with HTTP; Wed, 21 Feb 2007 09:35:55 -0800 (PST) Message-ID: <908a00750702210935o562f2e95ta0caa01316d46d39@mail.gmail.com> Date: Wed, 21 Feb 2007 22:35:55 +0500 From: "Nabeel Khalid" To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Duplicate Content. In-Reply-To: <908a00750702210925t68f66d8bk7df0ccdd030615d0@mail.gmail.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_10303_15383067.1172079355407" References: <908a00750702210925t68f66d8bk7df0ccdd030615d0@mail.gmail.com> Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.184.230 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.184.230; envelope-from=gnabeel@gmail.com; helo=wr-out-0506.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 21 Feb 2007 17:36:14.0058 (UTC) FILETIME=[C8A314A0:01C755DE] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Hi, It has come to our attention that the site http://www.insidethesports.com/hosted on your server at IP: 67.18.160.106 have indulged in Copyright Infringement. They have copied many of our complete websites and compiled it into a single website. Examples are Our Website: http://www.tennis-shoes.us/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/1/tennis-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.bridal-shoes.us/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/bridal-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.dress-shoes.biz/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/dress-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.basketball-shoes.us/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/1/basketball-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.jessicasimpsonshoes.org/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/3/jessica-simpson-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.vans-shoes.us/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/3/vans-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.womens-shoes9.com/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/womens-shoes.html Our Website: http://www.girls-shoes.net/ Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/girls-shoes.html This includes over 20 of our websites. We request you to remove either the duplicate content or the website from your server. Thanks, Nabeel Khalid Ovalcom Inc MIME element (text/html) Hi,
It has come to our attention that the site http://www.insidethesports.com/ hosted on your server at IP: 67.18.160.106 have indulged in Copyright Infringement.
They have copied many of our complete websites and compiled it into a single website.
Examples are

Our Website: http://www.tennis-shoes.us/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/1/ tennis-shoes.html

Our Website: http://www.bridal-shoes.us/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/ bridal-shoes.html

Our Website: http://www.dress-shoes.biz/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/ dress-shoes.html

Our Website: http://www.basketball-shoes.us/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/1/ basketball-shoes.html

Our Website: http://www.jessicasimpsonshoes.org/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/3/ jessica-simpson-shoes.html

Our Website: http://www.vans-shoes.us/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/3/ vans-shoes.html

Our Website: http://www.womens-shoes9.com/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/ womens-shoes.html

Our Website: http://www.girls-shoes.net/
Duplicate Page: http://www.insidethesports.com/2/ girls-shoes.html

This includes over 20 of our websites.

We request you to remove either the duplicate content or the website from your server.

Thanks,
Nabeel Khalid
Ovalcom Inc
 MIME element (text/plain)
